name: Froogle Home
description:
Made in Melbourne for Global Game Jam 2019 (page: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/froogle-home).

The theme was "what home means to you", so you play as a "Froogle" Home and try to convince the homeowners to buy smart appliances, obviously.

Credits:

Alastair Bilby: Programming (bilbyfactor.itch.io)
Charlie Franzke: Art (charlie_franzke.artstation.com)
John Hickton-Burnett: Art (mrgrim.artstation.com)
Tegan Roxburgh: Art (teganr.com)
Zak Stephens: Programming (zakstephens.com)
Ryan Wheeler: Art, Programming (moltenmetalgames.wordpress.com)
